segments.text: I'm looking at a kitchen scene right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a line drawing, quite detailed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's an adult woman and two children in the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing at the sink, drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her back is mostly to the children, and she seems completely focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the sink is completely overflowing with water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is spilling over the front edge and onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has one foot right in the growing puddle, but she doesn't react at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, a boy is precariously balanced on a stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into a cookie jar in an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl is standing nearby, eagerly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a stark contrast between her calm and their mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene feels like a moment just before something big happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed anything yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tidy garden outside makes the internal chaos even more apparent.
segments.speaker: PAR
